peril.model.combat

Class Test_CombatHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.model.combat.Test_CombatHelper

  • public final class Test_CombatHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Tests that CombatHelper functions properly.
    Since:
    2018-03-14
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    CombatHelper, CombatRound, CombatView, GameController

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      private void checkDiceRolls(java.lang.Integer[] diceRolls)
      Checks that the numbers that are in the parameter dice rolls are in descending order.

      Constructs a standard CombatRound for testing purposes.
      void setUp()
      Sets up the CombatHelper that will be used by every test.
      void test_fight_diceOrder()
      Test that the dice that are in CombatView.attackerDiceRolls and CombatView.defenderDiceRolls are ordered from highest (index: 0) to lowest.
      void test_fight_unitsKilled()
      This test confirms that when if a dice if the attackers dice was higher than the defenders dice that the unit is removes from the appropriate squad.

    • Method Detail

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets up the CombatHelper that will be used by every test.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If setup fails throw Exception.

      • test_fight_diceOrder

        public void test_fight_diceOrder()
        Test that the dice that are in CombatView.attackerDiceRolls and CombatView.defenderDiceRolls are ordered from highest (index: 0) to lowest.

      • test_fight_unitsKilled

        public void test_fight_unitsKilled()
        This test confirms that when if a dice if the attackers dice was higher than the defenders dice that the unit is removes from the appropriate squad. This assumes that there is only a single atomic ModelUnit in the UnitHelper.

      • checkDiceRolls

        private void checkDiceRolls(java.lang.Integer[] diceRolls)
        Checks that the numbers that are in the parameter dice rolls are in descending order.
        Parameters:
        diceRolls - The dice rolls.

      • getStandardRound

        private CombatRound getStandardRound()
        Constructs a standard CombatRound for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        A standard CombatRound
